lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael Bloomberg says that New York City stands to lose access to a $1 billion pool of federal money to finance improved communications because its system does not meet federal guidelines.

headline.main: Mayor Says City Risks Losing Grants for Security
headline.print_headline: Mayor Says City Risks Losing Grants For Security

snippet: Mayor Michael Bloomberg says that New York City stands to lose access to a $1 billion pool of federal money to finance improved communications because its system does not meet federal guidelines.
